name: domain
description: Description: The domain name of the instance.

name: title
description: Description: The title of the website.

name: version
description: Description: The version of Mastodon installed on the instance.

name: source_url
description: Description: The URL for the source code of the software running on this instance, in keeping with AGPL license requirements.

name: description
description: Description: A short, plain-text description defined by the admin.

name: usage
description: Description: Usage data for this instance.

name: usage[users]
description: Description: Usage data related to users on this instance.

name: usage[users][active_month]
description: Description: The number of active users in the past 4 weeks.

name: thumbnail
description: Description: An image used to represent this instance.

name: thumbnail[url]
description: Description: The URL for the thumbnail image.

name: thumbnail[blurhash] OPTIONAL
description: Description: A hash computed by the BlurHash algorithm, for generating colorful preview thumbnails when media has not been downloaded yet.

name: thumbnail[versions] OPTIONAL
description: Description: Links to scaled resolution images, for high DPI screens.

name: thumbnail[versions][@1x] OPTIONAL
description: Description: The URL for the thumbnail image at 1x resolution.

name: thumbnail[versions][@2x] OPTIONAL
description: Description: The URL for the thumbnail image at 2x resolution.

name: languages
type: Type: Array of String (ISO 639-1 two-letter code)
description: Description: Primary languages of the website and its staff.

name: configuration
description: Description: Configured values and limits for this website.

name: configuration[urls]
description: Description: URLs of interest for clients apps.

name: configuration[urls][streaming_api]
description: Description: The Websockets URL for connecting to the streaming API.

name: configuration[accounts]
description: Description: Limits related to accounts.

name: configuration[accounts][max_featured_tags]
description: Description: The maximum number of featured tags allowed for each account.

name: configuration[statuses]
description: Description: Limits related to authoring statuses.

name: configuration[statuses][max_characters]
description: Description: The maximum number of allowed characters per status.

name: configuration[statuses][max_media_attachments]
description: Description: The maximum number of media attachments that can be added to a status.

name: configuration[statuses][characters_reserved_per_url]
description: Description: Each URL in a status will be assumed to be exactly this many characters.

name: configuration[media_attachments]
description: Description: Hints for which attachments will be accepted.

name: configuration[media_attachments][supported_mime_types]
description: Description: Contains MIME types that can be uploaded.

name: configuration[media_attachments][image_size_limit]
description: Description: The maximum size of any uploaded image, in bytes.

name: configuration[media_attachments][image_matrix_limit]
description: Description: The maximum number of pixels (width times height) for image uploads.

name: configuration[media_attachments][video_size_limit]
description: Description: The maximum size of any uploaded video, in bytes.

name: configuration[media_attachments][video_frame_rate_limit]
description: Description: The maximum frame rate for any uploaded video.

name: configuration[media_attachments][video_matrix_limit]
description: Description: The maximum number of pixels (width times height) for video uploads.

name: configuration[polls]
description: Description: Limits related to polls.

name: configuration[polls][max_options]
description: Description: Each poll is allowed to have up to this many options.

name: configuration[polls][max_characters_per_option]
description: Description: Each poll option is allowed to have this many characters.

name: configuration[polls][min_expiration]
description: Description: The shortest allowed poll duration, in seconds.

name: configuration[polls][max_expiration]
description: Description: The longest allowed poll duration, in seconds.

name: configuration[translation]
description: Description: Hints related to translation.

name: configuration[translation][enabled]
description: Description: Whether the Translations API is available on this instance.

name: registrations
description: Description: Information about registering for this website.

name: registrations[enabled]
description: Description: Whether registrations are enabled.

name: registrations[approval_required]
description: Description: Whether registrations require moderator approval.

name: registrations[message]
description: Description: A custom message to be shown when registrations are closed.

name: contact
description: Description: Hints related to contacting a representative of the website.

name: contact[email]
description: Description: An email address that can be messaged regarding inquiries or issues.

name: contact[account]
description: Description: An account that can be contacted natively over the network regarding inquiries or issues.

name: rules
description: Description: An itemized list of rules for this website.
